_sText:
So first of all this is my second beta which i made while ago. First beta were tested at public but I didint spread it anywhere cause I wanted to check how it plays and fix stuff.

Map has been made kinda low detailed to make it run fine with my current mapping skills. :D

Map has been also optimized so it did run perfectly with 32 players with respawn (all the time all players in battle). I had 60 - 120 fps all the time with my comp that arent so good. So for example most of zm maps has much lower fps with this comp.

Ppl did like it. Or I think so. When there was vote for changing/extending map allmost everyone did extend it 2 times row.

Map has also some "secrets" which arent so hard to find.

When u look at the pic #2 I think ure wondering that its annoying to fall from the pipes and die. But actually it teleports u to grave yard for 0 - 30 sec. So its not good idea to jump there in panic to get away from zombies cause zombies gets u for sure at gy (no camps and not so much space to run). Mmeh i think its better to become zombie than die? Em I wrong?

Hmmh I think I recommend 32 - 50 players for this map. It has 60 spawns.

About that it has mixed gameplay there is possiblity to camp normally, barricade, climb, hunt and so on.


Server where I tested this map:
Name: House of the livingdead (ZombieMod 2.0 beta)
IP: 84.244.162.241:27015

Nice zombiemod 2.0 (beta) server. All settings has been set personally for each map if needed so i recommend this srv to all who likes zm 2.0. ;)
